column5: Good morning all, well it's going to be a nice warm long weekend me thinks   Enjoy!!!  .  Play safe and have fun everyone.  Maureen
Love Fridays, nothing better than being on the water on a long weekend! have fun all!
TGIF... Leaving for the cottage in 5 hours!!!!! Fishing all weekend!!!!!!!!!!!
Have a great time everyone and please be safe.
Another extreme heat alert today. Take a lot of bottled water out on the boats for all you that are lucky enough not to be sitting at a desk.
Looks like its going to be a great weekend.  Have a good one everyone.  We're off first think Saturday morning for some camping and fishing.  Take care all  Joey
Mornin Mo, It mat be a long day down her today but after 5 Yipeeeeeeeee, have a good one
Good afternoon!  I'll be staying home finishing up a project.     and my whole family is heading up from Ottawa!!  It's quiet for a few hours anyway.  Have a great weekend all.  Pam
